title: Improvement of Instructional Design Theory Framework and Research-Based Teaching Method Design

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Aims to enhance the capacity of pre-service and in-service teachers to improve instructional design frameworks applicable in mathematics education settings and develop research-based teaching methodologies.

learning_goals: Learners analyze media integration strategies in instructional design frameworks and propose applications for mathematics education
Learners evaluate immature teaching methods and derive improvements using a research-to-improve approach
Learners design formative assessment-centered mathematics instructional materials using smartphone-based tools in blended environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
